snippet: Efforts to curb over-prescribed prescription drugs; Sam Grobart on how much data you use on your smartphone; and David Carr looks at the return of newspaper barons.
abstract: Efforts to curb over-prescribed prescription drugs; Sam Grobart on how much data you use on your smartphone; and David Carr looks at the return of newspaper barons.

headline.main: Business Day Live: A Ballooning Megabyte Budget
